price: 168.  “Si tuviéramos una revelación como tuvieron las comunidades que nos precedieron,
arabic: لَوۡ أَنَّ عِندَنَا ذِكۡرٗا مِّنَ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: law anna ʿindanā dhik'ran mina al-awalīna
